edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler

Class WolfScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler

  • public class WolfScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    WolfScheduler reads in and stores as a list of all of the Activity records stored in a file. Also WolfScheduler creates a schedule and provides functionality for naming a schedule.
    Author:
    Prem Subedi

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        Returns course based on the passed name and section parameter. Returns null if the course with the provided name and section can't be found in the catalog.
        Parameters:
        name - course's name.
        section - course's section.
        Returns:
        null if course can't be found.

        public boolean removeActivity(int idx)

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String eventTitle,
                     java.lang.String eventMeetingDays,
                     int eventStartTime,

                     int eventWeeklyRepeat,
                     java.lang.String eventDetails)

        Parameters:
        eventTitle - title of an event.
        eventMeetingDays - event meeting days.
        eventStartTime - event starting time.
        eventEndTime - event ending time.
        eventWeeklyRepeat - event weekly repeat.
        eventDetails - details of event.
